dmca.title: [ABUSE] Please be aware
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 31, 2005 2:30 PM
To: neilhiggs@btinternet.com
Cc: legal-response@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Please be aware

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Neil Higgs <neilhiggs@btinternet.com>
To: "The Planet Policy Enforcement" <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Monday, January 31, 2005, 12:09:19 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Please be aware

===8<==============Original message text===============
Your 24 hours for compliance has now passed.

Further actions will now be taken against your company and servers.

Thank you


- ----------------------------------------------------------------
** www.kwiktoys.com **
'The Number One Source For All Your Console Needs'

** www.mrmodchips.com **
'For All Your Console Modification Requirements'

All comments contained within this email are stated 'without prejudice' and
are the sole property of the original sender. No authority or permission is
given to any person(s) or bodies for reproduction either in full, or part,
of this email contents.

- ----- Original Message -----
From: "The Planet Policy Enforcement" <abuse@theplanet.com>
To: <neilhiggs@btinternet.com>
Cc: <copyright@theplanet.com>
Sent: Monday, January 31, 2005 5:52 PM
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Please be aware


> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
>
>
> Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
> address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
>
> - --
> Thanks,
>
> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
>
>
> This is a forwarded message
> From: Neil Higgs <neilhiggs@btinternet.com>
> To: <copyright@theplanet.com>
> Date: Saturday, January 29, 2005, 5:23:20 PM
> Subject: [ABUSE] Please be aware
>
> ===8<==============Original message text===============
> Please be aware one of your rented servers is being used to host lies and
> mistruths concerning my company.
>
> IP : 69.93.248.137
> Shared Server :  137.69-93-248.reverse.theplanet.com
> URL : www.resellerratings.com
>
> Please be aware should these lies and mistruths NOT be removed by you
> within
> 24 hours then further actions will be taken to ensure they are removed.
>
> As you are no doubt aware as your attention has been drawn towards the use
> of your equipment for such liable to be used you are beyond all doubt
> legally responsible for its publication.
>
> I trust no further actions will be deemed necessary by myself to ensure
> your
> compliance.
>
> Thank you
>
> - -------------------- --------------------------------------------
> ** www.kwiktoys.com **
> 'The Number One Source For All Your Console Needs'
>
> ** www.mrmodchips.com **
> 'For All Your Console Modification Requirements'
>

> given to any person(s) or bodies for reproduction either in full, or part,
> of this email contents.
>
>
